list.abs: horsemint oil的中文解释沪江词库精选horsemint oil是什么意思、英语短语。horsemint oil的中文释义: 马薄荷油相关短语: horsemint oil 马薄荷油.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from horse (often used in the names of plants to denote a coarse variety) + mint

means.word_mean: 1. an annual horsemint of central and western United States and northern Mexico
2. tall erect perennial or annual having lanceolate leaves and heads of purple-spotted creamy flowers; many subspecies grown from eastern to southwestern United States and in Mexico
3. a coarse Old World wild water mint having long leaves and spikelike clusters of flowers; naturalized in the eastern United States
